name: Chital III Floor Lamp
description: The Chital III Floor Lamp by Kifu Paris is a sleek and sculptural piece, inlaid in a mixture of bronze-patina brass with shagreen or shell inlay. The chiseled legs, which are an iconic shape within the KIFU PARIS universe, morph into the solid shades that create a modern-vintage feel. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans. Custom color/sizing is available on request. Made to order 8-10 weeks. Wipe clean with a soft dry cloth.
